articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Pyongyangites was held at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Tuesday to celebrate the second successful nuclear test.
					 Attending it were senior party, army and state officials, leading officials of party, armed forces and power organs and working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of organs and enterprises in the city, persons of merits and citizens of different circles.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in a speech said that the nuclear test was a grand undertaking to protect the supreme interests of the DPRK and defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation in face of the U.S. imperialists' unabated threat to mount a preemptive nuclear attack and sanctions and pressure upon it.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK defending the destiny of the country and the nation and socialism and opening a great heyday of prosperity unprecedented in the history spanning 5,000 years demonstrated the dignity of the nation and the strong national power through the successful nuclear test, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The successful nuclear test powerfully encourages the servicepersons and people of the DPRK all out in the 150 day-campaign, effecting a new revolutionary surge to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation. It will contribute to defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and socialism and ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity with the might of Songun.
					
					 The situation of the country is growing tenser as the days go by owing to the vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. imperialists and the Japanese reactionaries and their lackeys the south Korean conservative forces. But the army and the people of the DPRK with the strong nuclear deterrent for self-defence will make steady advance along the road of independence, the road of Songun full of the faith and optimism without the slightest vacillation, he added.
					
					 Representatives of the Korean People's Army, scientists, workers and agricultural workers also made speeches at the meeting.
					
					 They called on all the party members and other working people to work hard to effect a new great revolutionary surge by giving full play to the potentials built up in the crucible of the Songun revolution and thus open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Railways Leaves
articles.content:
A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Railways Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Ministry of Railways led by Minister Jon Kil Su left here today to participate in the 37th Ministerial Meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation to be held in Kazakhstan.
					 Meanwhile, a delegation of the Workers' Party of Turkey headed by Dasar Karadag, member of its Central Committee, arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Olympic Solidarity Football Coaching Course Held
articles.content:
Olympic Solidarity Football Coaching Course Held
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Olympic Solidarity Football Coaching Course was held at the Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang from May 13 to 22.
					The course was attended by football coaches of home sports teams and football teachers from juvenile sports schools, more than 30 all told.
					
					Taken up there were a wide range of subjects including the trend of development of modern football, game systems, the duty and role of coaches and training programs for football players of different age groups.
					
					The course was presided over by Lim Kim Chon, a FIFA lecturer.
					
					It provided the coaches of the DPRK with a good opportunity to improve their practical ability.

articles.title: DPRK's Power Increased by Dint of Songun
articles.content:
DPRK's Power Increased by Dint of Songun
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The progressives of the world are praising highly the DPRK's successful launch of the artificial satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 as a brilliant victory of the great Songun politics.
					 Only the United States and other bellicose forces, turning their face from the trend of the times, are hell-bent on aggressive rackets, taking issue with the satellite launch, a great undertaking in history.
					
					 The army and people of Korea, however, are forcefully pushing ahead with the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation with indomitable mental power, without shrinking in the least from the ever intensified moves of the hostile forces.
					
					 This world-startling indomitable spirit is based on the confidence and pluck which have been cemented steel-strong in the flames of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The actuality verifies how correct are Songun politics, reliable precious sword for defending national sovereignty and peace, and the increase of self-reliant defense capabilities, its offspring.
					
					 Songun politics reflects the revolutionary will of the Workers' Party of Korea to safeguard with credit the national dignity and interests and achieve the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country without fail on the principle of giving importance and priority to the military affairs.
					
					 The Korean army and people, who resolutely opted to take the road of Songun at the historic crossroads of independence and subordination, have opened a new era of national prosperity, frustrating all the reckless isolation and stifling moves of the imperialist allied forces on the forefront against imperialism and for independence.
					
					 It is the revolutionary mettle and immovable will of the army and people of Korea not to allow any slightest moves of the hostile forces against their just cause.
					
					 It was strikingly manifested in the fact that some time ago the DPRK solemnly declared at home and abroad that it would further increase the self-defensive nuclear deterrent and defend reliably the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula with the might of Songun to cope with the acts of the enemy incriminating the DPRK's right to peaceful space development.
					
					 Today the imperialist reactionaries' hostile policy toward the DPRK is going to naught in face of the might of Songun and the DPRK is demonstrating its power all over the world.
					
					 Only prosperity is in store for the DPRK as long as it is guided by Songun politics, a symbol of independence and dignity.

articles.title: Souvenir Picture Which Was Not Taken
articles.content:
Souvenir Picture Which Was Not Taken
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The car carrying General Secretary Kim Jong Il was running a sightseeing road of Mt. Kuwol on May 1, Juche 86 (1997).
					The road under construction was yet far short of completion. Not minding this, however, he did not take his eyes off a car window as if he was fathoming the troubles of the soldier builders.
					
					He got off the car near the fork of the road in the mid-slope of the mountain and met commanding officers of a unit of the Korean People's Army engaged in the building of the holiday resort of Mt. Kuwol and highly appreciated the painstaking work of the soldier builders. He earnestly told them to spruce up the mountain to provide the people with a better resort of cultural recreation, true to the behest of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					He went round a number of construction sites through the sightseeing road built by soldiers and spread before them a far-reaching blueprint to turn the mountain into a splendid resort of cultural recreation for the people.
					
					The sun of May Day began to sink unnoticed.
					
					Out of the ardent desire to provide him a happy time, if but for a moment, officials earnestly asked him to have a picture taken with them against the background of the picturesque scenery of the mountain.
					
					He smiled a generous smile of understanding and said that was not a good idea when the resort was in the thick of construction and he would come again after the completion of the project and have a souvenir picture taken.
					
					The officials were choked with emotion at his words full of warm love for the toiling soldier builders whom he thought before anyone else.
					
					The story about the souvenir picture which was not taken will go down long to the posterity as a legend of the leader's love for the KPA soldiers along with Mt. Kuwol, a famous mountain of the people.

articles.title: U.S. Warmongers Accused of Stepping up Military Moves against the DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Warmongers Accused of Stepping up Military Moves against the DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. warlike forces are now contemplating forward-deploying two squadrons of F-22 in Japan and Guam after winding up the deployment of 30 land-based interceptor missiles targeted against the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					 These moves lay bare the sinister and dangerous scenario of the U.S. to put the Asia-Pacific region under its military control.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its way of thinking and wild ambition that it can dominate the world only when it puts the above-said region under its control. The aim sought by the U.S. imperialists through the deployment of F-22s is to carry out its blitz strategy based on a surprise pre-emptive attack upon any target.
					
					 Recalling that the DPRK is the first target of their attack on the Asia-Pacific region, the commentary notes: The present U.S. administration is talking about what it called a "change" and "bilateral dialogue" but it is, in actuality, pursuing the same reckless policy as followed by the former Bush administration to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has single-minded unity more powerful than nuclear weapons and invincible military capability unfathomable in its range and depth.
					
					 The U.S. moves to mount a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK are as foolish an attempt as taking oil to extinguish the fire.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are keeping themselves fully combat ready with a high degree of vigilance against the above-mentioned moves of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to halt at once its dangerous military moves against the DPRK if it wants to escape the lot of a tiger moth, bearing deep in mind that any attempt to make a pre-emptive attack on the DPRK is little short of inviting a disaster itself.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts on KIZ Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts on KIZ Flayed
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- No sooner had the north's measure related to the issue of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) been made public than the south Korean authorities grumbled that "they can not accept the unilateral measure taken by the north," describing it as an "irresponsible measure" and expressing "deep regret" and the like. The ultra-right conservative groups including the "Grand National Party" went the lengths of recklessly crying out for "closing the KIZ."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What they uttered is nothing but the despicable behavior of the confrontation-minded elements, dead-set against the June 15 joint declaration, to mislead the public opinion and a revelation of their black-hearted intention to turn the KIZ into a theater of the north-south confrontation in a bid to close it.  
					
					 Complicated issues hard to solve cropped up in the work of the KIZ several times after the emergence of the conservative Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea, but the DPRK has exercised patience and shown magnanimity for its smooth development and encouraged the moves to reenergize it. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee group has pursued such extreme policy of confrontation as "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" in persistent negation of the north-south joint declaration and the idea of "By our nation itself," blocking the cooperation and exchange between compatriots and bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse as the days go by. This resulted in completely demolishing the foundation of the work in the KIZ. 
					
					 In order to bring the situation under control the north proposed a working contact for the revision of contracts on the KIZ and made efforts to realize it. But the south side defied these efforts and persistently raised the issue irrelevant to the agenda of the contact, deliberately laying a hurdle in the way of the contact. In the long run, it turned down even the north's proposal for having an additional contact, putting up an unreasonable precondition. The south side thus deprived both sides of the chance to have hard-won inter-Korean working contact. 
					
					 The Lee group will be held wholly accountable for the unpardonable crimes it has committed against the nation, hell-bent on the confrontation with the north, by scuttling the work in the KIZ in which the aspiration of all Koreans after the country's reunification is reflected.

articles.title: Abe's Reckless Remarks Agitating Reinvasion of Korea Slammed
articles.content:
Abe's Reckless Remarks Agitating Reinvasion of Korea Slammed
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Former Japanese Prime Minister Abe, taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch in a recent lecture given in Tokyo, cried out for examining the adjustment of a legislation and equipment in a bid to make the Japan "Self-Defense Forces (SDF)" capable of attacking enemy's military bases, ie striking the bases of the rival.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are kicking up a racket which sounds strange to others, absurdly terming the DPRK' launch of satellite for peaceful purposes a "long-range missile testfire." This is aimed to convert Japan into a war state capable of unilaterally declaring a war and embarking upon a war of aggression overseas.
					
					 It is their black-hearted intention to deliberately invent "a missile threat" from the DPRK and hype it in a bid to turn the situation favorable for laying a legal foundation for mounting a preemptive attack and bolstering up its military capability.
					
					 Short time ago, Abe, referring to the issue of prime minister's visit to "Yasukuni Shrine," let loose a spate of reckless remarks that it is natural for the leader of the country to pay respects to those who fell in actions for the country and those who died for the sake of the country. This fact should be interpreted in close linkage with the above-said intention.
					
					 It is not hard to guess what Abe truly had in mind when he called for paying respects to those who had been thrown into the dumping ground of history after meeting deaths for perpetrating crimes against humanity.
					
					 It is the real contention of Abe that the young Japanese should turn out to conquer other nations and exterminate them by inheriting the spirit of overseas aggression displayed by their ancestors.
					
					 Japan is turning reactionary and conservative at a rapid tempo as such militarist maniacs as Abe are allowed to strut about, eagerly waiting for the advent of the day when Japan would advance into the Asian continent unhindered, firing artillery pieces.
					
					 The entire Japanese society will suffer a horrible disaster unless such hysterics as Abe are ostracized and eliminated socially in order to bar Japan from rushing headlong into a war and doom.

articles.title: Valiant Struggle for National Reunification Urged
articles.content:
Valiant Struggle for National Reunification Urged
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should wage a valiant struggle to smash the anti-reunification moves of the separatists at home and abroad, cherishing deeper in mind the faith in the national reunification and thus bring earlier the dawn of the reunification of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in a signed article on Tuesday.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have been put into an irreparable crisis due to the reckless anti-DPRK confrontation and war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative ruling forces following it, the article points out, saying that this grave reality demands the awareness and decision of the entire Korean nation.
					
					 The reunification of Korea can be accelerated only through the valiant struggle of the nation to foil the moves of separatists at home and abroad, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is high time that all Koreans in the north and the south conducted a merciless and vigorous struggle to deal a crushing blow to the aggressors and sycophantic traitors swimming against the trend of the times toward the reunification, by giving full play to their strong will and mental power.
					
					 The key to the national reunification is a nationwide struggle to put an end to the U.S. occupation of south Korea and its policy of confrontation and war against the DPRK and the treacherous moves of the south Korean authorities servile to it.
					
					 Due to the reckless moves of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group in conclusion with it, there are stumbling blocks in the way of the national reunification movement, but the prospect of Korea's reunification is rosy thanks to the inexhaustible strength of the Koreans who are struggling closely rallied as one in the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 When the Koreans pool their efforts and struggle in unity, it is quite possible to foil any challenge of the separatist forces at home and abroad and open a broad avenue for the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Plot to Cook up "Spy Case" Exposed
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Plot to Cook up "Spy Case" Exposed
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Choe Tong Jin, department director of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), when interviewed by a journalist of Internet newspaper Jaju Minbo on May 19, accused the puppet authorities of working hard to fake up a "spy case" to crack down upon the organization these days.
					 He recalled that some days ago, the "Intelligence Service" and the police jointly conducted a wholesale search and seizure and arrest operation against the South Headquarters of Pomminryon and are stretching the tentacles of suppression to youth organizations, too.
					
					 He held that the Lee Myung Bak "government," much upset by the candlelight actions last year, is seeking a way of stifling the progressive camp in fabricating a "spy case."
					
					 He went on to say:
					
					 As the Lee regime failed in its plot to label the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration "an organization linked with a spy," it is now keen to brand the said headquarters as "a large organization linked with a spy" at any cost.
					
					 The authorities are now regarding all the overseas Koreans related to the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration as "spies" and expanding the scope of investigation to the south Korean organizations for the reunification movement which have got in touch with them, he pointed out, and went on:
					
					 The suppression of the said headquarters precisely means a negation of the June 15 joint declaration and an act to totally stamp out those forces supporting the declaration.
					
					 He called upon all the people to turn out in the struggle to judge the Lee Myung Bak "government" for intensifying its fascist suppression and driving the inter-Korean relations into collapse as the days go by.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Flailed
Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Joint Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations to Counter Suppression of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) grouping at least 100 civic and public organizations in south Korea held a rally on May 23 at which it vowed to struggle against the puppet authorities' crackdown on the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					Speakers at the rally said that the suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, a legitimate organization for the reunification movement, clearly proves that the Lee Myung Bak "government" is becoming evermore undisguised in its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					They charged that the authorities' suppression is an intolerable challenge to the ardent desire of all Koreans in the south and the north and abroad for independent reunification and a criminal act of totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					They declared they can never pardon the Lee Myung Bak "government" which mobilized even the "Intelligence Service" for suppressing the reunification movement of the said headquarters on the charge of being "an enemy-benefiting organization" and has stretched the tentacles of crackdown to other organizations. 
					
					A resolution read out at the rally said: The present "government" is suppressing the progressive organizations on charges of violation of the ill-famed "National Security Law" after labeling all the personages of conscience critical of it "criminals." Not content with this, it is keen to bring the charge of "espionage" to those forces for the reunification movement struggling to defend and implement the historic south-north joint declarations. 
					
					All the people aspiring after social progress, independence, democracy and reunification will get united and wage a valiant struggle to force Lee Myung Bak to step down, it stressed.

articles.title: Release of Detained Patriotic Student Urged
articles.content:
Release of Detained Patriotic Student Urged
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on May 21 demanding the police immediately release the detained patriotic student.
					 The statement accused the "security investigation corps" of the Mokpho Police Station of coming even to Seoul and walking off to it on May 20 Kim Son Nam, student of Chosun University, who has devotedly struggled for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The security organs are getting more frantic in their repressive actions, backed by the Lee Myung Bak man-killing dictatorial regime, but this is nothing but its last-ditch effort to get rid of its crisis in order to stay in power, the statement noted.
					
					 With no suppression can the regime calm down the people's anger, it held, urging Lee to step down of his own accord, clearly knowing where he stands.
					
					 The statement demanded the security authorities halt such suppression little short of man-killing and release the detained Kim Son Nam at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Vietnamese Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Vietnamese Figure
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is a great man who has devoted his everything to the people, said Nguyen Thi Thanh Hoa, president of the Central Committee of the Vietnam Women's Union, who visited the DPRK.
					 The successes made by the DPRK prove the validity of the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, she noted, and went on:
					
					 Gifts displayed at the International Friendship Exhibition House clearly show how boundlessly the world people revere him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made the gifts he received from party and state leaders and prominent figures of many countries serve as treasures of the people and that is why the Korean people hold him in high esteem as a distinguished leader and follow him. 
					
					 I am confident that the Korean people rallied close around Kim Jong Il will achieve bigger prosperity in the future.
					
					 The friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung have been carried forward and developed by General Secretary Nong Duc Manh and Kim Jong Il, she noted, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative ties between the peoples of the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Brought out in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Brought out in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was brought out in booklet by the Morelos branch of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism on May 19.
					 This work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), deals with the founding of the Juche idea which serves as an unshakable guiding idea of the Korean revolution and a great revolutionary banner of our era, its philosophical principle, its socio-historical principles, its guiding principles and the historic significance of the Juche idea which has contributed to the development of human thought and the human cause of liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de compania Kamnamu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de compania Kamnamu
 Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y  soldados del EPC, presencio la funcion artistica de las militares de la compania Kamnamu (caqui) del EPC que obtenia el triple titulo de Bandera Roja de las Tres Revoluciones.
					Las militares de dicha compania, conocida en todo el pais como simbolo del amor a los soldados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, pusieron en la escena el coro "Nuestro General es el mejor", el cuento y cancion "El General y nuestra compania Kamnamu", el cuarteto vocal y coro "!Resuene la cancion del soldado lleno de felicidad", la poesia y cancion "Azul cielo de mi pais", la musica instrumental y cancion "Nuestra epoca de soldado", el solo y coro "?Quien me lo enseno?", el coro y baile "Cancion de artilleras costeras", el coro "Marcha" y otras piezas de diversos tipos.
					
					  A traves de la funcion donde palpitan el entusiasmo revolucionario y el impetu combativo y rebosa del abundante sentimiento, las ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la orgullosa vida de servicio militar de que bajo el regazo afectuoso del General padre disfruta de toda la felicidad y demostraron el poderio del heroico EPC crecido como potente ejercito invencible, la ferrea conviccion, la voluntad  y el espiritu combativo del EPC dispuesto a defender a  costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con el fusil la causa revolucionaria del Juche, sirviendose todos de fortaleza y escudo.
					
					  El  Comandante Supremo se mostro muy satisfecho de que ellas ofrecieron la magnifica funcion artistica con multiples piezas que reflejan vividamente sus vidas y evaluo altamente sus exitos de funcion.
					
					  Subrayo que todas nuestras militares no solo estan preparadas como las fuertes en la idea y la conviccion sino tambien estan crecidas como fervientes revolucionarias y combatientes del Songun dispuestas del elevado nivel cultural y anadio que contar con tal gran unidad femenina fidedigna es otro orgullo de nuestro ejercito.
					
					  Una de las labores importantes para elevar la combatividad de la unidad  es librar con energia entre los militares las actividades culturales y artisticas, senalo y presento las tareas que se presentan para fortalecer las actividades artisticas en todas las unidades incluidas las companias.
					
					  Le acompanaron en verla los generales de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae, Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi y Choe Ik Gyu y otros cuadros directivos del CC del partido.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras militares de belicistas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia maniobras militares de belicistas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente, las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas terminaron la ubicacion de 30 cohetes de interceptacion de tierra contra el Norte de Corea e intentan emplazar 2 batallones de cazas "F-22" en Japon y la isla Guam. Esto muestra patentemente la ambicion negra e intento de Estados Unidos de tomar la hegemonia militar en la region de Asia y el Pacifico.
					  Asi critica el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en su comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					  EE.UU. piensa en que si se apodera de esta region, podria dominar al mundo. Este modo de pensar y la ambicion fueron y son invariables.
					
					  El objetivo de los yanquis para emplazar los cazas "F-22" reside en realizar la estrategia de guerra relampago basada en el ataque preventivo sobre cualquier objeto.
					
					  El primer blanco de este ataque en dicha region es la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La actual administracion de EE.UU. habla tanto del supuesto "cambio" y "dialogo entre ambas partes".  Pero, en realidad, hereda fielmente la temeraria politica de aplastamiento militar de Bush contra Corea.
					
					  La RPDC tiene la unidad monolitica mas poderosa que las armas nucleares y las fuerzas militares invencibles que nadie puede suponer.
					
					  Las maniobras de EE.UU. encaminadas a asestar el ataque preventivo a la RPDC igualan a que se mete en la boca del lobo.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea se encuentran en pleno estado de alerta combativa con alta vigilancia frente a tales maniobras imprudentes del imperio.
					
					  EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de que el intento de ataque preventivo contra Corea es precisamente  una locura que le acarrea por si mismo la desgracia y tiene que poner fin de inmediato a sus peligrosos actos militares contra esta si quiere evitar el destino de polilla nocturna.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda del traidor MB
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda del traidor MB
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Recientemente,  tan pronto como fueron publicadas las medidas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea referentes al problema de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK), las autoridades surcoreanas dijeron que tales medidas son "irresponsables" y "gran pena" y anadieron que "no pueden aceptar las medidas unilaterales del Norte de Corea".
					  E incluso, los compinches conservadores ultraderechistas incluido el "Gran Partido Nacional" insistieron absurdamente en que "hay que cerrar la ZIK".
					
					  Esto es la tergiversacion de la opinion publica de los que niegan totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el designio tendente a cerrar por completo la ZIK convirtiendola en un lugar de confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					   Pese a que se presentaban en varias veces los problemas complicados y dificiles en la labor de la ZIK despues de aparecer el conservador "poder" de Lee Myung Bak en el Sur de Corea, la RPDC vino impulsando la activacion de dicha zona mostrando la paciencia y la generosidad para su desarrollo favorable.
					
					  Pero, la banda de Lee nego perversamente la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", interrumpio la cooperacion e intercambio entre los connacionales mediante su extrema politica de enfrentamiento como "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" y llevo las relaciones N-S a la ruptura total destruyendo asi completamente la base de las labores de la ZIK.
					
					  En particular, al dar espaladas a los esfuerzos de la RPDC que presento el contacto de trabajo para la enmienda de los contratos de la ZIK, desde la critica situacion dada y pretende llevarlo al exito, la banda  titere surcoreana creo las  dificultades artificiales ante este contacto presentando obstinadamente el problema no relacionado con el punto de la agenda del contacto. Al fin, negando con la injusta condicion premisa la propuesta adicional de la RPDC para el contacto, llevo al fracaso la oportunidad de contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur preparado al cabo de e tantos esfuerzos.
					
					  La banda de Lee, que enloquecida por la confrontacion fratricida llevo al fracaso las labores de la ZIK que reflejan la aspiracion de toda la nacion coreana a la reunificacion, asumira la entera responsabilidad por imperdonable crimen antinacional.

articles.title: Corea: cursillo para entrenadores de futbol de solidaridad olimpica
articles.content:
Corea: cursillo para entrenadores de futbol de solidaridad olimpica
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 13 al 22 en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung el cursillo para los entrenadores de futbol de solidaridad olimpica.
					  A la ocasion asistieron mas de 30 entrenadores de esta disciplina deportiva de varios equipos deportivos y maestros asignados de las escuelas deportivas de jovenes y ninos del pais.
					
					En la ocasion se abordaron varios problemas, entre otros, la tendencia del desarrollo del futbol moderno, el sistema del partido, el deber y el papel del entrenador y el plan de entrenamiento para los jugadores correspondiente a las edades.
					
					Lo impartio el lector del futbol de la FIFA Lim Kim Chon
					
					El presente cursillo sirvio de un buen motivo para elevar el nivel practico de los entrenadores de futbol de Corea.
